description: Canonical JSON schema defining the required structure for CPES (S6.7) simulation outputs and S7 metric consumption, ensuring deterministic and validated input for the S8 Finality Certification.

certified_utility_S01.description: The computed efficacy metric based on CPES output. Must be a non-negative float.

estimated_risk_S02.description: The estimated cost or failure profile associated with the plan. Non-negative float.

execution_fingerprint.description: A cryptographic hash representing the attested state of the CEEP isolation environment.

context_attestation_commit_pass.description: Re-attestation that S4.5 (ECVM) context criteria were valid throughout simulation.

resource_consumption_report.description: Validated report detailing resource use (CPU/GPU/Memory/Time) during simulation.

model_attestation_id.description: The unique, attested ID of the model utilized from the CMR for this simulation.
